meanings.definition: Swollen or distended, especially due to fluid accumulation.
meanings.sent1: The turgent balloon was ready to burst.
meanings.sent2: The turgent river flooded the nearby fields.
meanings.sent3: The turgent watermelon looked like it might explode!
meanings.sent4: Her turgent cheeks flushed with embarrassment.
meanings.sent5: The turgent clouds signaled an impending storm.

meanings.sent1: His turgent attitude made him unpopular with his peers.
meanings.sent2: The turgent actor demanded special treatment on set.
meanings.sent3: The peacock strutted around with a turgent air about him.
meanings.sent4: She wore her turgent ego like a crown.
meanings.sent5: The turgent CEO believed he was above everyone else.
